experiences.desc:
Contributed to the transition from a monolithic test engine to MS architecture by designing and implementing a Kubernetes-hosted service for pub/sub communication between services. 
Created an end-to-end workflow for video recording UI tests in a MS architecture, benefiting numerous Test Engineers.
experiences.caption: Video recording Selenium tests

experiences.desc:
Automated C# tests for a Windows desktop app, improved testing coverage by 10%, and led a significant codebase refactoring removing >150k lines of code. 
Created GitHub Actions workflows for running web tests, and built a real-time React dashboard for QA test monitoring.
experiences.caption: Desktop application Oasis Montaj

desc: Explored deep learning methods for 3D mapping and modelling interstellar dust, designed physics-based neural networks, and tested accuracy of models with noisy simulated data.
experiences.caption: Gaia's view of dust in the milky way (Green et al 2019)

projs.name: MyBnB
projs.desc: Designed and implemented database schema and major backend business requirements for a mock AirBnB platform accessed via APIs. Includes reports for insights, and a host toolkit to suggest how they can gain more customers.

projs.name: Amorr
projs.desc: An MVC web app connecting users and service providers, offering a range of services: beauty, landscaping, with filtering and scheduling capabilities.

projs.name: AutoDashboard
projs.desc: Interactive real-time React dashboard to monitor test execution statuses for Seequent's QA team. Developed during my internship at Seequent.

projs.name: HomeyBot
projs.desc: A discord bot that creates a safe space for the community, as dictated by the community. The goal is to use community-based decision-making to choose what is deemed as inappropriate words, graphic images, or sensitive subjects and how to deal with it.

projs.name: AccessMe
projs.desc: A chrome extension that provides an all-in-one solution to personalize your browsing experience and takes us one step closer to universal accessibility on the web.

projs.name: 3D Dust Visualizer
projs.desc: Developing an open-source geospatial application rendered with WebGL that displays a 3D interstellar dust map based on our galaxies estimated log-dust density data.
